package.name: PageDotsBeGone
package.shortDescription: PageDotsBeGone allows you to not only hide your page dots but also customize the way they look and feel.

descriptionlist.description:
PageDotsBeGone allows you to not only hide your page dots but also customize the way they look and feel.
It allows you to hide the page dots above the dock and also hide the page dots for stacked widgets.
Alternatively, if you don't want to hide them, you change the color of them.

PageDotsBeGone is a tweak available on both rootless and rootful jailbreaks.
